languages.text: "Почему нет? Нередко условия видимости в бою оставляют желать лучшего". {n}Проктор закрывает глаза и ждет очереди для выстрела.{/n}
"Why not? Visibility in combat is usually far from ideal." {n}The Proctor closes his eyes and waits for his turn to shoot.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Почему нет? Нередко условия видимости в бою оставляют желать лучшего". {n}Проктор закрывает глаза и ждет очереди для выстрела.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Why not? Visibility in combat is usually far from ideal." {n}The Proctor closes his eyes and waits for his turn to shoot.{/n}

"Why not? Visibility in combat is usually far from ideal." {n}The Proctor closes his eyes and waits for his turn to shoot.{/n}
"Why not? Visibility in combat is usually far from ideal." {n}The Proctor closes his eyes and waits for his turn to shoot.{/n}

languages.text: 「いいですね。戦場でも視界なんてろくにないですから」{n}代理人は目を閉じ、自分の番が来るのを静かに待った。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Why not? Visibility in combat is usually far from ideal." {n}The Proctor closes his eyes and waits for his turn to shoot.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「いいですね。戦場でも視界なんてろくにないですから」{n}代理人は目を閉じ、自分の番が来るのを静かに待った。{/n}

languages.text: "Pek tabii olur! Çatışmada görüş mesafesi genellikle ideal olmaktan uzaktır." {n}Üsteğmen, gözlerini kapatıp ateş etme sırasını bekliyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Why not? Visibility in combat is usually far from ideal." {n}The Proctor closes his eyes and waits for his turn to shoot.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Pek tabii olur! Çatışmada görüş mesafesi genellikle ideal olmaktan uzaktır." {n}Üsteğmen, gözlerini kapatıp ateş etme sırasını bekliyor.{/n}

languages.text: «¿Por qué no? La visibilidad en combate no suele ser perfecta». {n}El Procurador cierra los ojos y espera su turno para disparar.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Why not? Visibility in combat is usually far from ideal." {n}The Proctor closes his eyes and waits for his turn to shoot.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «¿Por qué no? La visibilidad en combate no suele ser perfecta». {n}El Procurador cierra los ojos y espera su turno para disparar.{/n}

languages.text: “这有何不可呢？真正的战场上，能见程度往往相当不理想。”{n}索罗蒙闭上了眼睛，等待轮到他射击。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Why not? Visibility in combat is usually far from ideal." {n}The Proctor closes his eyes and waits for his turn to shoot.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “这有何不可呢？真正的战场上，能见程度往往相当不理想。”{n}索罗蒙闭上了眼睛，等待轮到他射击。{/n}

languages.text: « Pourquoi pas ? La visibilité au combat laisse bien souvent à désirer. » {n}Le proctor ferme les yeux et attend son tour de tirer.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Why not? Visibility in combat is usually far from ideal." {n}The Proctor closes his eyes and waits for his turn to shoot.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Pourquoi pas ? La visibilité au combat laisse bien souvent à désirer. » {n}Le proctor ferme les yeux et attend son tour de tirer.{/n}

languages.text: "Warum nicht? Sichtbarkeit im Kampf ist alles andere als ideal." {n}Der Proktor schließt die Augen und wartet auf deinen Schuss.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Why not? Visibility in combat is usually far from ideal." {n}The Proctor closes his eyes and waits for his turn to shoot.{/n}
